news.title: 加拿大总理警告：旧世界秩序不会回来
news.title0: Carney says old world order 'is not coming back'
news.content: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼在达沃斯论坛警告，旧秩序已一去不返，中等强国必须团结，否则将沦为“菜单上的菜”。
news.content0: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said the "old order is not coming back" and urged fellow middle powers to come together in a speech at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland."Middle powers must act together because if we're not at the table, we're on the menu," Carney said on Tuesday, adding that he believed powerful nations were using economic coercion to get what they want.He also affirmed Canada's support for Greenland, Denmark and the Nato alliance, drawing applause.Carney did not mention Donald Trump by name, but some of his remarks seemed aimed at the US president, who is threatening to tariff European allies and the UK unless Greenland is surrendered to the US.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 欧洲议会将暂停批准美欧关税协议
news.title0: Europe to suspend approval of US tariffs deal
news.content: 因美国就格陵兰问题威胁加征关税，欧洲议会计划暂停批准去年七月达成的美欧关税协议，美欧贸易关系再度紧张。
news.content0: The European Parliament is planning to suspend approval of the US tariffs deal agreed in July, according to sources close to its international trade committee.The suspension is set to be announced in Strasbourg, France on Wednesday.The move would mark another escalation in tensions between the US and Europe, as Donald Trump ratchets up his efforts to acquire Greenland, threatening new tariffs over the issue on the weekend.The stand-off has rattled financial markets, reviving talk of a trade war and the possibility of retaliation against the US for its trade measures.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国副总统夫人宣布怀第四胎
news.title0: Second lady Usha Vance announces she is pregnant with fourth child
news.content: 美国副总统JD·万斯的妻子乌莎·万斯宣布怀上第四个孩子，预产期为七月末，母子状况良好。
news.content0: Usha Vance, the wife of Vice-President JD Vance, has announced she is pregnant with her fourth child.In a post on X, the second lady said she is looking forward to welcoming a boy in late July."Usha and the baby are doing well," a statement posted on Tuesday to the second lady's social media account read.Vance and his wife, Usha, 40, have three young children: Ewan, Vivek and Mirabel.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 奥地利奶牛被发现会使用工具
news.title0: Cow astonishes scientists with rare use of tools
news.content: 奥地利一头名为维罗妮卡的奶牛被发现能熟练使用扫帚等工具为自己挠痒，科学家称这是首次在牛身上记录到工具使用行为。
news.content0: Scientists are rethinking what cattle are capable of after an Austrian cow named Veronika was found to use tools with impressive skill.The discovery, reported by researchers in Vienna, suggests cows may have far greater cognitive abilities than previously assumed.Veronika, a cow living in a mountain village in the Austrian countryside, has spent years perfecting the art of scratching herself using sticks, rakes, and brooms.Word of her behaviour eventually reached animal intelligence specialists in Vienna, who found Veronika used both ends of the same object for different tasks.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国为查戈斯群岛协议辩护
news.title0: UK defends Chagos deal after Trump calls it 'act of great stupidity'
news.content: 特朗普批评英国将查戈斯群岛主权移交毛里求斯的协议是“愚蠢之举”，英国政府则坚称该协议不会损害国家安全。
news.content0: The UK government has defended a deal to give the Chagos Islands to Mauritius and lease back a key military base, following criticism from US President Donald Trump over its handling.In a post on social media, Trump labelled the move as an "act of great stupidity", months after he and senior US officials endorsed it.Later on Tuesday he confirmed he was "against" the deal.The UK government said it would "never compromise on our national security", while the prime minister's official spokesperson insisted the US still supported the move.The UK signed the £3.4bn ($4.6bn) agreement in May, under which it would retain control ofa UK-US military base on the largest of the islands, Diego Garcia.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿美元奥运场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，这座耗资23亿美元、灵感源于当地住宅的场馆引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: ChatGPT将根据对话内容向用户展示广告
news.title0: ChatGPT to start showing users ads based on their conversations
news.content: OpenAI宣布将在免费版ChatGPT中测试基于用户对话内容的广告，并推出每月8美元的“Go”订阅层级。
news.content0: ChatGPT may soon serve up ads for products it thinks you’d like to buy.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 巴基斯坦商场大火致21死数十人失踪
news.title0: Dozens missing, 21 killed after massive Pakistan mall fire
news.content: 巴基斯坦卡拉奇一家大型购物中心发生大火，已造成至少21人死亡，超过60人失踪，为当地十余年来最严重火灾。
news.content0: Karachi (Reuters) – Pakistani firefighters began pulling bodies from the smoldering remains of a sprawling Karachi shopping mall on Monday where more than 60 people were still missing after a massive fire that killed at least 21.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 科学家在极寒南极冰川建立研究营地
news.title0: Skies Clear, and a New Outpost Springs Up at the Bottom of the World
news.content: 科学家克服恶劣天气，成功在南极思韦茨冰川建立营地，将钻探冰层以研究其融化对全球海平面的影响。
news.content0: Aftera series of weather delaysthreatened to derail their mission, scientists on Monday managed at last to set up camp on Antarctica’s remote and fast-melting Thwaites Glacier. For the next few weeks, they will be attempting a difficult but vital operation.
news.author: NYTimes
